Description:
Tyintin
Escape to a less complicated life just 15min from Geelong, 5 minutes to famous 13th Beach and 10 mins to Barwon Heads. An excellent farm of 20 acres with significant infrastructure in a well treed, park-like setting , suitable for a wide range of agricultural or equine pursuits. Mt Duneed school bus is at the corner or Barwon Heads Primary and Kinder is just down the road. For secondary schools, the bus is on Barwon Heads Rd. This solid, passive solar, 3 bedroom + study family home is ready & waiting for your creative flair. With flowing spaces & three living areas, the home will accommodate the growing family. Three good sized bedrooms, main with ensuite featuring a spa to soak in after a hard day's work.
This home has a 440 litre solar hot water service that has off-peak boost for times of overcast weather. Two 22,000 litre water tanks supply the home or you can just use the town supply.
Other features include a double car garage with internal access and remote door and new floor coverings throughout the home.
This property has several sheds, a feature being the large shed that is 36mx9m with power, telephone and concrete floor. Second smaller shed also has power, phone and concrete floor. Property has 10 paddocks serviced with town water and accessed with a central laneway. Cattle yards and undercover sheep yards with small shearing shed also feature. This charming farming/rural environment is waiting for you, enquire today.
Insights: 40 Belchers Lane, CONNEWARRE VIC 3227 was last sold in 2012 and 3 other 4 bedroom house in CONNEWARRE have recently been sold.

Description:
Charming Country Homestead Close to Town
Situated on 63 acres (25.5 ha) of lush pastureland, “Meadowbank” is a charming country homestead which has been fully renovated to include all modern luxuries. Wide verandas, dripping with wisteria, shade trees and frontage to the Connewarre wetlands, all serve to make this a special property.
The large kitchen, with modern appliances and walk-in pantry, opens to the informal family room. The formal lounge has views across the gardens, and cosy Coonara, there is also a light-filled formal dining, separate, expansive informal living, master bedroom with WIR and en-suite, and 2 double-sized bedrooms serviced by a central bathroom with spa. No modern convenience has been overlooked, with solar hot water, r/c a/c and ducted vacuum. The property is serviced by town water, a 25,000L water tank and good-sized dam. Currently run as a pony stud, it is fenced into 6 large paddocks, with holding yards, stable complex and arena.
Ian Friend : 0414 581 811
Insights: 365. Lake Road, CONNEWARRE VIC 3227 was last sold in 2012 and 4 other 3 bedroom house in CONNEWARRE have recently been sold.

Description:
Abutting Rural Living Zone, Two Road Frontage. 15ha-38 acres approx.
Thoroughbred training, (1000 metre track),
pre - training,
breeding and agistment.
Four bedroom home, two living areas, office, two car carport under roof. Pool & outdoor entertaining area.
Stable block including: horse wash, office, feed room & 10 box's. There are 15 day yards (including 8 with shelters). Silo, Truck shed 5m x 9m, shed 6m x 12m, concrete floor. Various other shedding. Fenced into 19 paddocks (electric) with connecting laneways. Watered by three dams and town water is connected.
Work horses on the beach 5 minutes away. 10 minutes Torquay, 10 minutes Barwon Heads. 15 minutes to Geelong Racecourse. 1hr, 10 minutes to Melbourne via new ring road.
An astute investor would suggest that this property may come under serious consideration for possible future rural living sub - division (STCA).
Call: Peter Lindeman 0418 525 609 or Ian Friend 0414 581 811
Peter Lindeman : 0418525609

Description:
The Best of Both Worlds
$775,000 - $850,000
Strategically positioned at the head of a prestigious court, in the heart of Connewarre village, is this supreme example of passive energy design and water efficiency, midway between Geelong and Barwon Heads within minutes of the beach. The return driveway leads to this stately homestead directly opposite the hidden gem that is the Connewarre recreation reserve and all amenities.
Whilst a substantial building, the foyer emits a feeling of warmth and welcome as you find your way into the expansive living, lounge and dining area with its beautifully appointed kitchen with granite bench tops, glass splashback and stainless steel appliances; it says family wherever you go. Be it along the broad, tiled hallways to the sisal carpeted bedroom of the parent's wing with its voguish en-suite and BIRs; or to the east wing where another four serviced bedrooms await your children and guests. It is an impressive home.
A well-appointed office overlooks the rear garden and just outside there is the oasis like solar heated pool and spa with its own amenities and gazebo with a turreted shelter adjacent, nothing has been too much for this most tasteful of homes. The garden is a joy to behold as you wander amidst its perennial layout and its own water treatment plant. The hothouse, surrounded by fruit and olive trees, awaits your next season's choice planting.
Further back toward the home is the huge workshed 12 x 6 m with 3 phase power. Water tanks are in abundance maintaining year round supply; and the inconspicuous solar hot water system for the homestead is typical of the many hidden benefits of this property.
How green is my valley!
Insights: 105 Bluestone School Road, Connewarre VIC 3227 was last sold in 2009 and 1 other 5 bedroom house in Connewarre have recently been sold.

Description:
Elegant Farmlet By The Sea
$790,000 - $860,000
Nestling quietly in a sheltered nook of the Bellarine is this superb 5-acre property, fully set up for horses and with a wonderfully appointed house.
Just off the Geelong-Barwon Heads road, 'Lyndhurst' is supremely situated five minutes from Bancoora beach, 15 minutes from Torquay, 10 minutes from Barwon Heads and 10 minutes from Geelong.
In a picturesque setting, the property starts with a sweeping gravel drive winding through aged gum trees to the double garage with house adjacent. Outside there are four beautiful horse paddocks complete with self watering concrete troughs and quality electrified fences.
There's also a spacious shed and two covered horse yards, complete with two loose box stables and a horse "crush". Currently home to two thoroughbreds, all the horse facilities are in top condition.
The beautiful architect-designed very sunny house is 26 years old, with three bedrooms, one divided into two by BIRs. It has a great all-electric kitchen, separate dining room with cedar lined ceiling, charming spacious living room with open fire, main bedroom with outlook to fernery, and an ensuite.
There's also a second living room with dining area adjacent to kitchen, a spacious rumpus room, and a separate study.
The second bathroom has separate shower and bath and double vanity, and is adjacent to a roomy laundry with ample cupboards and access to the garage.
Other features include quality carpets and curtains throughout, outside water tank, outside entertainment area with 12m in-ground swimming pool, Rheem 315 litre hot water service, and zoned slab heating throughout the house.
This is a golden opportunity for a family wanting horsess and a peaceful rural lifestyle close to the sea and all the joys of the Bellarine Peninsular.
* 5 acres set up for horses
* 3 living rooms
* Beautiful rural setting
* In-ground swimming pool

Description:
SO MUCH TO OFFER..
Located in a quiet court 2 mins from the gateway plaza, this 7-year-old custom designed home is now seeking new owners to enjoy its livability. With quality fittings and designed to maximise natural light and space this beautiful home is sure to impress.
The hub of the home is the open plan living, dining and kitchen area which has been designed to make living easy. Featuring two wall-mounted ovens, a large walk-in pantry with adjustable shelves, a two drawer dishwasher, space for a fridge and a freezer, all complemented by an island bench with a breakfast bar. The adjacent very generous eating area features stacker/slider doors leading to the covered alfresco entertaining area, where you can enjoy summer BBQs and gatherings with family and friends.
The roomy main bedroom has a stylish ensuite and large walk-in robe, while the remaining two bedrooms feature built-in robes and are serviced by a large bathroom and separate toilet with its own hand basin.
A good-sized study is located adjacent to the living area and overlooks the front garden.
Ceiling fans and ducted gas heating throughout, together with reverse cycle air conditioning in the living area will keep you comfortable all year round.
Outside, there are attractive low maintenance gardens, two work sheds and three raised veggie beds now being prepared for new season crops.
With so much to offer an inspection is a must.
THIS COULD BE THE PERFECT HOME FOR YOU.

Description:
A bright, spacious & low maintenance home
Youll love:
This modern & extremely well-presented home comes with loads of impressive features & finishes, including excellent natural light, freshly painted interiors and soft neutral tones throughout.
The spacious & clever floorplan flows a treat, also offering plenty of privacy and separation where it counts!
A kitchen thats built for entertaining featuring stainless steel appliances & a quality stone island benchtop with great interaction between the main living/dining zone, plus a sliding door that opens into a sunny BBQ area.
The location is also a winner: situated in a friendly court with good primary schools close by, walking distance to Surf City Plaza & old Torquay shops, plus Deep Creek Reserve is at the end of the street.
Plus:
The master bedroom with ensuite & WIR is located at the front of the home; while 2 additional bedrooms (both with BIRs), a central bathroom & the laundry are all in a separate wing.
A versatile 2nd living space with sliding doors & a lovely garden outlook just off the wide entrance hall.
Theres also the ducted central heating throughout, split system heating/cooling & quality built-in cabinetry in the main living area, a double remote garage with internal access & loads more.
This wonderful north-facing block also features mature trees & a landscaped front yard with a gorgeous reading spot, raised veggie patches, a water tank, plus a grassy & low maintenance backyard.
Insights: First listed on 29 September, this house has been on Domain for 20 days (last updated on 29 September). It was last sold in 2010 and 126 other 3 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
A BEAUTIFUL FAMILY HOME IN THE SANDS ESTATE!!
A BEAUTIFUL FAMILY HOME IN THE SANDS ESTATE!!
Located in a quiet cul-de-sac alongside the Sands Golf Course, this modern 4-bedroom home has been built to offer the ultimate coastal lifestyle. Built on one level, the fantastic floor plan will suit any family dynamics, and will certainly impress with its appealing façade, light-filled large open plan kitchen / dining and living and copious storage space. A north-west facing undercover entertaining deck provides alfresco dining all year round with a landscaped garden backdrop. A formal lounge or parents retreat greets you at the entrance which is connected to the master bedroom via double sliding doors. The master offers both walk-in and built-in-robes and full en-suite, the remaining 3 bedrooms include floor-to-ceiling built-in robes with the family bathroom centrally located.
Features of this home include: timber industrial sliding doors, gas central heating, reverse cycle air conditioning, laundry with great storage, double garage with internal entry and rear roller door, watering system, gas outlet for BBQ, and landscaped gardens set on a huge 707m2 (approx.) allotment. With access to the impressive The Sands Golf Course and Clubhouse which includes the four-lane lap pool, tennis courts, gym and pro-shop and only minutes to Whites beach, new schools, playgrounds and town centre, this home presents the perfect opportunity to make the sea change, weekend getaway or investment. Call today to book your private inspection.
Insights: First listed on 23 September, this house has been on Domain for 27 days (last updated on 23 September). It was last sold in 2013 and 139 other 4 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
When quality and convenience counts.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Matthew Hunt on 0433 176 611.
Ideal for those seeking a low maintenance carefree lifestyle within easy reach to a range of services. Light filled living is a hallmark of this new residence where quality fixtures and fittings are a key feature.
Consisting of three bedrooms, master with WIR and ensuite, central bathroom for the remaining bedrooms, powder room, open plan kitchen, dining and lounge room leading to alfresco entertaining area. Features include double car remote garage with secure access, stone bench tops throughout, hardwood timber floors, double glaze windows, electric cooking, dishwasher, multiple split systems throughout and fully landscaped low maintenance garden.
Well positioned within easy reach of Highton Village, Barrabool Hills Plaza, Private Secondary and Primary Schools, Queens Park Golf Course and Recreational Parks along the Barwon River, quick access to the Ring Road takes you to Melbourne under an hour and only a short hop to Waurn Ponds Shopping and Train Centres, Aquatic Centre, Deakin University and Epworth Hospital as well as a 10min drive to the Geelong CBD further present this home as a sought after location and residence.
This property was designed and constructed with the upmost attention to detail and the quality truly shows upon inspection. Don't miss out on your opportunity, call to organise your own viewing today.

Description:
Maximum accommodation position plus!
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Matthew Constantine on 0401 393 993 or Matthew Hunt on 0433 176 611.
Abundant light filled accommodation with a flexible floor plan are the hallmarks of this delightful residence where space and convenience counts. Well located within easy reach of a range of key services this delightful home provides the ideal lifestyle setting.
Consisting of four large bedrooms, (three BRs plus optional extra lounge in main residence), light filled lounge, spacious kitchen and dining area leading to under cover alfresco area plus the big bonus of a self-contained studio at the rear. Features include gas ducted heating, split system A/C, lock up garage and carport all situated on a large allotment of approx. 653sqm with a north facing rear yard.
Well positioned within easy distance to High Street shopping, Clairvaux Primary School, Belmont High School and public transport. Only a short hop to the Waurn Ponds shopping, Aquatic Centre, Deakin University, Epworth Hospital and the Ring Road taking you to Melbourne in an hour. For those seeking big accommodation in a unique location enquire today!

Description:
Low-Maintenance Living In A Walk To Everything Location!
Don't miss this chance to embrace low-maintenance living within walking distance to Highton Village! Whether you're a first homebuyer, investor, or downsizer, you'll need to act swiftly to secure this terrific opportunity!
With frontage onto Bracken Court, you'll love that this location is peaceful while still being moments from everyday essentials. The sporting grounds of Highton Reserve are an instant from your front door, along with the Highton Bowls Club and Highton Tennis Club - making this an ideal choice for fitness enthusiasts! Public transport is footsteps away, while Highton Village provides you with an abundance of shopping and dining options. Young families are taken great care of with Bellevue Pre-School Centre and Highton P.S only a short stroll away. The Barwon River walking trails are close by, while superior Ring Road access is ideal for commuters.
The original interiors grant you the option to move straight in or to update with a contemporary touch (STCA). The lounge overlooks the front garden, while the kitchen/meals zone is equipped with an oven and gas cooktop. Two bedrooms feature built-in robes, while the bathroom is complete with a combined shower/bath and single vanity. The laundry and separate toilet complete the layout. A standout feature of this property is the north-facing backyard, which is shared between all four units. Home to gardens, this grassy area provides a sunny outdoor retreat that is rare to find in compact homes.
So whether you're dreaming of owning your own home, searching for the next addition to your investment portfolio, or looking to downsize in a superb location, this property will impress! Inspect without delay! This superb location will leave you wanting nothing. Deakin University (Waurn Ponds) is within walking distance, along with public transport and the Epworth Hospital. Families will appreciate that a selection of schools are close by, including Marcus Oldham College and the Christian College Campuses. The Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre provides you with an abundance of shopping and dining options, while superior Ring Road access is ideal for Melbourne commuters. With a rental return of approx. $250-270 per week, this conveniently located home is a terrific investment opportunity.
- Communal, north-facing backyard
- Single carport for off-street parking
- Gas wall heater and air conditioner
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Oh-so spacious, light-filled & liveable!
Youll love:
This spacious & luxurious 5-bedroom home, complete with its beautiful landscaping, ocean views & more.
The wow factor of the stylish kitchen: featuring quality appliances & a huge 100mm waterfall stone island bench, plus the equally impressive walk-in-pantry, picture window splashback & subway tiling.
A choice of 3 large indoor living spaces all of which are bursting with natural light and the fantastic outdoor living zone thats ideal for relaxing & entertaining all year round.
All the small details that make this home oh-so liveable like the handy kicker vac in the kitchen, extra storage & bench space in the laundry, lovely wide hallways, and elegant wall niches throughout.
Plus:
Downstairs also has a large guest bedroom with a semi-ensuite, a separate sitting room, plus the main living/dining area that connects to the partially covered deck area & tiered backyard.
Upstairs features a master bedroom with a private balcony, ensuite & walk-through robes plus 3 extra bedrooms with BIRs, another bathroom, and a large 3rd living area with floor-to-ceiling cabinetry & ocean views.
Double glazing, ducted heating & a ducted vacuum system throughout, refrigerated cooling on both levels, a remote gas fireplace in the main living area, plus the over-sized double remote garage.
Located in an established street with great neighbours on both sides and a real sense of community, this luxurious coastal opportunity will impress!
Insights: First listed on 28 September, this house has been on Domain for 22 days (last updated on 28 September). It was last sold in 2013 and 24 other 5 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
A perfect beach pad or ideal investment!
For sale by Openn Negotiation (flexible conditions online auction). The Openn Negotiation is under way and the property can sell at any time. Contact Chris immediately to become qualified and avoid disappointment. Open to all buyers, including finance, subject to seller approval.
https://www.openn.com.au/app/properties/view/btc5gvihqojg16dr91og?negotiationId=btc5gvihqojg16dr91p0
Youll love:
Chilling out in this contemporary townhouse thats been custom-built by a well renowned local builder & one of only two on the block offering a location and lifestyle that will appeal to most!
The homes natural light, warmth & welcoming feel: thanks largely to the oversized north facing windows and raked ceiling that sits high above its funky yet functional interiors.
Having a well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, stone benchtops & overhead pendant lighting that connects to a generous living area with a cosy and effective wood heater too.
The great sized private outdoor landscaped area also wraps around the home and provides a wonderful spot for relaxation and soaking up the sunshine all year round.
Plus:
Theres 2 bright, spacious double bedrooms with huge wardrobes, including one with ensuite plus a stylish modern bathroom with integrated laundry completing this low-maintenance floor plan.
Other features youll love include the sleek internal feature doors, plantation shutters & quality blinds throughout, plus the split-system heating/cooling in the main living room.
The home also has private keyless entry, a drive-in carport with additional lockable storage and off-street parking space for 1 extra car.
Situated at the end of a quiet court & adjacent to a walking track the surf & buzz of Torquays popular eateries, shops & everything else you need is just an easy cruise from this clever & stylish townhouse!

Character filled family home - Look no further!
Thoughtfully designed is this unique family home split over 3 levels; combining a spacious floorplan with style and an abundance of natural light. Offering all the comforts for a first home buyer, second family home or an investment.

- 681sqm (Approx.) allotment

- Formal Living Room at the Front offers 2nd living area along with a separate study.

Enjoy the luxury of being situated in one of Geelong's most highly sought-after locations, only a short drive to Waurn Ponds shopping Center, Deakin University, Waurn Ponds Train Station and within easy access to the Geelong ring road. This propertys natural charm and all it has to offer will have it sitting at the top of everyone's inspection list. Contact Nyree today for an inspection!

Description:
Sublime Living In Quiet Court Setting
The Feel:
A delight to the senses, this home embodies idyllic storybook charm. From the enchanting Wisteria-entwined entry, to the picturesque pool-side garden setting, this character-filled weatherboard home exudes a calming ambience in a private hideaway setting. Kitchen, dining & living with a turquoise pool backdrop extends the desirability of year-round outdoor living, with curated gardens & a colour palette to soothe & inspire. Set on a large block in a secluded court locale with completely private outdoor living, the rural outlook offers a stunning vista & shelter from southerly winds.
The Facts:
-Flooded with natural light & glazing that embraces garden views at every turn
-Kitchen, dining, living with timber flooring looks over the pool & terraced entertaining areas
-9x3.5m salt-chlorinated, solar-heated, self-cleaning pool is the focal point
-Merbau deck & sandstone surrounds the pool, with shady pavilions creating an outdoor room
-Suntrap private rear garden attracts northern sun path, shielded by southerly winds
-Enchanting Wisteria entry, thru RC double gates, creates idyllic storybook charm
-Zoned north facing living with gas log fire overlooks veranda to white peach, apple & hibiscus trees
-Climate comfort with gas-fired log heater, ducted heating, 2 SSACs & ceiling fans to all rooms
-Kitchen with Westinghouse electric oven, Whirlpool induction cooktop & Bosch DW
-Well-appointed master suite w/ SSAC, WIR & outlook beyond veranda to colourful citrus garden
-Renovated en-suite w/ rain shower, twin vanity & Moroccan design porcelain tiles
-2 more bedrooms with BIRs & ceiling fans flow to the open plan living area
-Refreshed main bathroom with large shower, bath & convenient separate WC
-New taps, fixtures & toilets to both BAs, all new lighting plan, freshly painted inside & out
-7 panel solar power
-Thriving, curated garden with productive fruit trees & vegie beds + hedges of salvia, mexican orange blossom, lavender & westringia
-Harvest lemon balm, thyme & sage from your own Tea Garden; rainwater tank to feed the garden
-Southern boundary cypress belt provides optimal privacy, with treed no-neighbour views
-Oversized DLUG caters to all needs + fully lined & lit attic storage. Additional garden shed
-Large block (app: 719m2) allows for at least 6 cars OSP (secure parking for trailer/caravan/boat)
-No thru traffic with links to pathways & walking tracks onwards to parklands, schools, shops & river
Owner Loves.
It is really homely, with such a relaxing ambience. We find ourselves using all parts of the block throughout the days and seasons, with dedicated spaces amongst the gardens & pool area to chase the sun from morning to night.
